ReferenceData.String:
SYNOPSIS
gmx [-[no]bool] [-int <int>] [-int2 <int>] [-str <string>] [-enum <enum>]
OPTIONS
Other options:
-[no]bool (yes) Boolean option -int <int> (3) Integer option -int2 <int> (2 3) Integer 2-value option -str <string> (foo) String option -enum <enum> (bar) Enum option: foo, bar
